entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wet flurries early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Snow level at valley bottom. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
